adrFormatAddress: 2409 Broadway, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: Salesperson Marie in the Broadway office NYC was very helpful and professional . Got us the samples ASAP , was knowledgeable and easy to work with . The communication was very good . We had initially had some building glitches with the install and Marie handled everything well. We love our living room and kitchen shades and we thank Marie for her great service !

originalText.text: I don’t know how this place got good reviews. Our Roman shades had to be remade 3 times due to quality issues. Once we got the shades, one automatic shade stopped working after few months. The repair person supposed to come today so I took the day off from work then I got an email the night before that there is no motor so the appointment got canceled. So frustrating.Do your research before getting your shades from this place!!

text.text: I don’t know how this place got good reviews. Our Roman shades had to be remade 3 times due to quality issues. Once we got the shades, one automatic shade stopped working after few months. So frustrating.Do your research before getting your shades from this place!!

originalText.text: Ted was an amazing help for our renovation project. He steered us toward the right combination of fabrics for our aesthetic. The Shade Store had a ton of options to consider and his eye for design and detail helped us make the right decision. From there the delivery and install of the drapes and shades was perfect and the communication in between excellent. I highly recommend working with The Shade Store at The Domain over the DIY or big box route.

originalText.text: Awful store, products, service, and follow through. We bought nearly all our shades from there and already malfunctioning and in need of repair. Going to replace after less than 4/5 years of infrequent use with a diff business for all of the aforementioned reasons. I would advise you to buy from anywhere else - buyer beware!

Going to replace after less than 4/5 years of infrequent use with a diff business for all of the aforementioned reasons. I would advise you to buy from anywhere else - buyer beware!

originalText.text: We had a really great experience starting with Saroya at the showroom on Broadway. We had no idea how many options there were. She helped us find the exact shades we needed and didn’t try adding anything we didn’t. She was very patient explaining everything to us. Extremely knowledgeable and friendly. The measuring team took great care making sure everything would work out. The install team were very careful, and professional. They were extremely thorough even removing our old blinds. The before and after is amazing. Do not hesitate to use The Shade Store!
